DatawRappr 1.0.0
  • Reference

Creates a new Datawrapper chart

dw_create_chart.Rd

Creates and returns the metadata of the new Datawrapper chart.

dw_create_chart(api_key = "environment", title = "", type = "")

Arguments

api_key

Optional. A Datawrapper-API-key as character string. Defaults to "environment" - tries to automatically retrieve the key that's stored in the .Reviron-file by datawrapper_auth.
title

Optional. Will set a chart's title on creation.
type

Optional. Changes the type of the chart. See the documentation for the different types.

Value

A list with the elements from the Datawrapper-API, the same as in dw_retrieve_chart_metadata()

Note

This function retrieves all metadata about the new chart that's stored by Datawrapper. If not specified, the new chart will by default be created without a title and with the type d3-lines.

Examples


if (FALSE) dw_create_chart() # uses the preset key in the .Renviron-file
if (FALSE) dw_create_chart(title = "Testtitle")

dw_create_chart(api_key = "1234ABCD") # uses the specified key
#> [1] "New chart's id: C6JzZ"

#> [1] "ok"
#>
